element.hint: If the Callback action is set, the caller will be played this prompt
element.label: Callback Prompt
element.name: callback_prompt

element.hint: Select who should be recorded in the call
element.label: Call Record
element.name: call_record

element.hint: Provide a clear description for this Queue
element.label: Description
element.name: description

element.hint: If T0 Congested Action is set to Warning Message, the caller will be played this prompt
element.label: Excessive Wait Prompt
element.name: excessive_wait_prompt

element.hint: If the Hang Up action is set, the caller will be played this prompt
element.label: Hang Up Prompt
element.name: hangup_prompt

element.hint: Defines what the customer will hear if the rep places them on hold
element.label: Hold Flow
element.name: hold_flow

element.hint: Select the action to take if there are no agents logged in
element.label: No Agents Action
element.name: no_agents_action

element.hint: If an Overflow action has been set, the call will be transferred to this queue
element.label: Overflow Queue
element.name: overflow_queue

element.hint: Select if a prompt should be played before transferring the call to the queue
element.label: Play Queue Prompt
element.name: play_queue_prompt

element.hint: Select if a whisper should be played to the rep on call accept
element.label: Play Whisper
element.name: play_whisper

element.hint: Defines the customer experience and treatment while waiting in queue
element.label: Queue Flow
element.name: queue_flow

element.hint: Define a unique identifier for this queue
element.label: Queue ID
element.name: queue_id

element.hint: Enter a user friendly Queue name
element.label: Queue Name
element.name: queue_name

element.hint: If Play Queue Prompt is set, the caller will be played this prompt before transfer to queue
element.label: Queue Prompt
element.name: queue_prompt

element.hint: Select the ServiceNow schedule that defines when this Queue is open
element.label: Queue Schedule
element.name: queue_schedule

element.hint: Select the action to take when the call is first placed in queue if the queue is congested
element.label: T0 Congested Action
element.name: t0_congested_action

element.hint: Select the action to take if the call has exceeded the T1 wait time
element.label: T1 Action
element.name: t1_action

element.hint: Calls waiting less than this time are considered to have experienced a reasonable wait
element.label: T1 Threshold
element.name: t1_threshold

element.hint: Select the action to take if the call has exceeded the T2 wait time
element.label: T2 Action
element.name: t2_action

element.hint: Calls exceeding this threshold have experienced an extreme wait time
element.label: T2 Threshold
element.name: t2_threshold

element.hint: Defines what the rep hears when the call is accepted
element.label: Whisper Flow
element.name: whisper_flow
